description: Two blocks of unequal mass, A and B, are suspended by a string around a pulley. Block B is heavier than block A. Draw a FBD for B as it accelerates.
hints: Only forces acting ON the system are included in an FBD
If an object is accelerating, it must have a net force in the direction of acceleration.
If mass 2 is heavier than mass 1, in which direction will it accelerate?
